site.title: SysManage - Modern System Management Platform
site.description: Modern system management platform for comprehensive infrastructure monitoring and automation

hero.title: Modern System Management Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Centralized monitoring, management, and automation for your entire infrastructure. Support for Linux, Windows, macOS, FreeBSD, and OpenBSD.

cross_platform.title: Cross-Platform Support
cross_platform.description: Manage Linux, Windows, macOS, FreeBSD, and OpenBSD systems from a single interface.

real_time.title: Real-Time Monitoring
real_time.description: WebSocket-based real-time communication for instant system updates and monitoring.

security.title: Enterprise Security
security.description: JWT authentication, mTLS, role-based access control, and comprehensive security scanning.

package_management.title: Package Management
package_management.description: Remote software installation, updates, and management across all supported platforms.

multilingual.title: Multi-Language Support
multilingual.description: Native support for 14 languages including English, Spanish, French, German, and more.

modern_ui.title: Modern Web UI
modern_ui.description: Responsive React-based interface with real-time dashboards and comprehensive reporting.

step1.title: Install Server
step1.description: Deploy the SysManage server on your infrastructure

step2.title: Deploy Agents
step2.description: Install agents on systems you want to manage

step3.title: Start Managing
step3.description: Access the web interface and approve your agents

docs.title: Documentation
docs.subtitle: Comprehensive guides for deploying, configuring, and managing SysManage.

server.title: Server Documentation
server.description: Complete guide for installing, configuring, and managing the SysManage server.

agent.title: Agent Documentation
agent.description: Setup and management guide for SysManage agents across all platforms.

api.title: API Reference
api.description: Complete REST API documentation for integrating with SysManage.

security.title: Security
security.description: Security features, best practices, and vulnerability reporting.

getting_started_section.title: Getting Started
getting_started_section.description: Quick start guides and tutorials for new users.

administration.title: Administration
administration.description: Administrative guides for managing users, hosts, and system settings.

footer.description: Modern system management platform for comprehensive infrastructure monitoring and automation.

webui_overview.title: Web Interface Overview
webui_overview.subtitle: Explore the SysManage web interface with detailed screenshots and feature explanations.

architecture.title: Architecture Documentation
architecture.subtitle: Technical documentation covering SysManage's system architecture, design patterns, and component interactions.

message_flow.title: Message Flow & State Management
message_flow.subtitle: Comprehensive overview of how messages are passed, queued, and processed between SysManage agents and the backend server.

overview.title: Architecture Overview
overview.description: SysManage uses a sophisticated message-passing architecture that ensures reliable, ordered communication between distributed agents and the central server. The system employs persistent message queues on both sides with automatic retry logic, priority handling, and state tracking.

websocket.title: WebSocket Layer
websocket.description: All real-time communication between agents and the server occurs over WebSocket connections secured with mutual TLS (mTLS). The WebSocket layer provides:

queuing.title: Persistent Message Queuing
queuing.description: Both agents and server maintain persistent message queues to ensure no data is lost during network interruptions or system restarts:

priority.title: Priority & Scheduling
priority.description: Messages are processed according to priority levels, ensuring critical operations are handled first:

monitoring.title: Monitoring & Observability
monitoring.description: The message flow system provides comprehensive monitoring capabilities:
